TopicTitle: PS5 issue. Saved game doesn't load. :( Upsetting... "There was a problem with the game or app"

Articles.Content:
I have a issue with my saved space center.

I bought a PS5 with the main intension that I could play Kerbal with less lag and crashes...............

Unfortunately, even though it plays better on the PS5 then the PS4, I just ran into a bug that has paused my gameplay until they resolve it. Game loads like normal but when I select my saved game (SCAREY SPACE CENTER) from the main menu is tells me "There was a problem with the game or app" then asks me to send a report.  After submitting the report the PS5 returns to the PS5 main screen and closes the game. I can start a new career with no issues. This is upsetting because i have put a lot of time into my main career and would like to continue it Darn it.

 

Has anyone ran into this / resolved the issue? 

 

Thank you ........................
I’m having the same problem, every time I try to continue my career game that I imported from the ps4 it just keeps crashing. I really don’t have a single idea how to fix this.

I bought a PS5 with the main intension that I could play Kerbal with less lag and crashes...............

I can start a new career with no issues. This is upsetting because i have put a lot of time into my main career and would like to continue it Darn it.

 

Has anyone ran into this / resolved the issue? 

 

Thank you ........................

Unfortunately, I'd chalk this up to the buggy version of console KSP.

There's not much that you can do that I know of.

Asides from migrating to PC and enjoying mods.

You can report bugs/issues for the console version of Kerbal Space Program by using the bugtracker, but keep in mind that the team has shifted their attention to KSP2 development so bug fixing for the original game will be slowed down significantly from now on.
